description: Electronic products to upgrade the lighting of the Port-Cartier institution. Deliverables include EIKO #SIG/450W/750/VD, Adapter, EIKO #SIG/SF, Reflector, EIKO #SIG/AL100D, Subcharger is not mentioned but will be used in conjunction with the contract.
full_summary:
# Lighting Upgrade for Port-Cartier Institution

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: 21301-23-4301029
* **Publication Date**: January 16, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 31, 2023, 2:00 PM (EST)
* **Expected Contract Start and End Dates**: To be determined
* **Trade Agreement**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Description of Work

The Correctional Service of Canada, Region of Quebec, seeks proposals for the upgrade of lighting at the Port-Cartier institution. The work involves the supply of electrical products to modernize the lighting infrastructure.

**Key Deliverables**:

* Lighting fixtures (EIKO #SIG/450W/750/VD)
* Adapters (EIKO #SIG/SF)
* Reflectors (EIKO #SIG/AL100D)
* Mounting arms (EIKO #FL5-MA)
* Conversion kits (EIKO #RK1-24324-3)
* LED strips (EIKO #RK1-22254-3)

**Submission Guidelines**

This is a competitive procurement with a lowest priced compliant bid strategy. Suppliers must be qualified under the Electrical and Electronic Products supply arrangement (E60HN-16ELEC). Interested suppliers can obtain a copy of the solicitation documents by contacting the contracting authority, Anne-Marie Cicero, at (438) 459-1723 or Anne-Marie.Cicero@csc-scc.gc.ca.

**Important Notes**

* The crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
* After contract award, bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process.

**Additional Information**

Procurement Assistance Canada (PAC) offers free seminars to businesses interested in learning how to sell goods and services to the Government of Canada. For more information, please visit the Buyandsell.gc.ca website. [1](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/event-calendar)
